mapper.sql: select t1.*,t2.JOB_SUBJECT,t2.JOB_NAME,t2.GROUP_NAME,t2.BEAN_OR_CLASS,t2.TARGET_OBJECT,t2.TARGET_METHOD,t2.CRON_EXPRESSION,t2.START_DATE,t2.NEXT_DATE,t2.END_DATE,t2.IGNORE_ERROR,t2.CONCURRENT,t2.DESCRIPTION,t2.STATUS,e.ENUM_TEXT FROM schedule_log t1 LEFT JOIN schedule_job t2 on t1.schedule_id=t2.id INNER JOIN ENUM_DETAIL e on t1.SCHEDULE_ID=e.INT1

#where() #if($_parameter.condition.jobName && $_parameter.condition.jobName != '') AND t2.JOB_NAME #set($_jobName = '%' + $_parameter.condition.jobName + '%') LIKE @{_jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
#end #if($_parameter.condition.enumText && $_parameter.condition.enumText != '') #set($_enumText = '%' + $_parameter.condition.enumText + '%') AND e.ENUM_VALUE LIKE @{_enumText,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #if($_parameter.condition.startTime && $_parameter.condition.startTime != '') AND t1.START_TIME>=@{_parameter.condition.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} #end #if($_parameter.condition.endTime && $_parameter.condition.endTime != '') AND t1.END_TIME<=@{_parameter.condition.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} #end #if($_parameter.condition.success && $_parameter.condition.success != '') AND t1.SUCCESS= @{_parameter.condition.success,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #end #end
mapper.select:
select t1.*,t2.JOB_SUBJECT,t2.JOB_NAME,t2.GROUP_NAME,t2.BEAN_OR_CLASS,t2.TARGET_OBJECT,t2.TARGET_METHOD,t2.CRON_EXPRESSION,t2.START_DATE,t2.NEXT_DATE,t2.END_DATE,t2.IGNORE_ERROR,t2.CONCURRENT,t2.DESCRIPTION,t2.STATUS,e.ENUM_TEXT
#order($_parameter.condition,"t1.START_TIME DESC")
FROM schedule_log t1 LEFT JOIN schedule_job t2 on t1.schedule_id=t2.id INNER JOIN ENUM_DETAIL e on t1.SCHEDULE_ID=e.INT1
select count(*) from schedule_log t1 LEFT JOIN schedule_job t2 on t1.schedule_id=t2.id
